Server.Name: Age of Oblivion A6.8 - Stable
Server.Description:
Last Update Unitl A21!
NEW 8k MAP! you want to try this Map out! completley Custom Map!
Many Balance cchanges and fixes. Skull tokens and vehicle keys are harder early on and increase with loot stage. NEW Amusement PArk/Circus POI (its about 90% done, Improvements will be made for A21) New Skills Weaponsmith and Advanced Power New Weapons Minor Improvements to all Trader Chambers New Wandering Hordes!
YOU MUST USE ONE OF THE AOOPREGEN MAPS!
Remember to Disable EAC and all file must be on both the server and the Client!
Please join the discord to report Bugs and feed back so we can quickly get to stable!
